articles.author: Liz Napolitano
articles.title: Stock futures are little changed after S&P 500 posts back-to-back losses: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Stocks slipped on Monday as investors sold their tech holdings heading into the end of 2025.
articles.content:
Stock futures were relatively unchanged overnight, after the S&P 500 posted back-to-back losses amid mounting pressure across the tech sector.
